channel.title: Jon M Chu on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jon M Chu on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Wicked: For Good’ Soundtrack Announces Release Date and Tracklist Including New Original Songs
item.description: The sequel soundtrack, which covers the stage musical’s second act, features a new song from both Cynthia Erivo and Ariana Grande, along with never-before-released “The Wicked Witch of the East."
